Lakewood.Rancho Los Cerritos:
This article refers to the land grant. For the Rancho Los Cerritos adobe, see Los Cerritos Ranch House
Rancho Los Cerritos was a 27,054-acre (109.48 km2) 1834 land grant in present-day southern Los Angeles County and Orange County, California The grant was the result of a partition of the Rancho Los Nietos grant. "Cerritos" means "little hills" in Spanish.
